modName: Miri Dragon Rise Armor animated with HDT-SMP better cloth effext - DELETED
summary: It's based on HDT-PE, and you also require a patch called "hdt_pe compatible with smp.rar"  which make the skirt animated normally.
descriptionHtml:
Hi, there.

Fist thing first, this armor mod was created by myself. Please don't share it anywhere.

You guys may be familiar with Vindictus, a famous Korean MMORPG which is quite advantageous on action. 
This armor mod is based on the new character Miri, a dragon-born as well as  the skyrim protagonist.
You may recognize dragon-rise armor has may dragon elements. It's so fascinating! That's why I convert it to skyrim. 

[b][size=3]Requirement Before Installing[/size]

[size=2]1.Make sure that your operation system already have installed "[color=#6aa84f]visual c++ redistributable package 2015[/color]",
   higher version will also be fittable.[/size]

[/b]2.[b][color=#a4c2f4]HDT Physics Extensions[/color], [color=#a4c2f4]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended 3.88[/color][/b]
3.[b][color=#a4c2f4]Heels Sound1.5[/color][/b]
   You can remove it if you know how to use TES5Edit.
4.[b]Most importantly[/b], please [color=#ff0000]do install[/color] "[b][color=#ff7700][size=2]hdt_pe compatible with smp.rar[/size][/color][/b]"  which I have included in the files pack.
5. Thosed items cannot be crafted, so please use ''[color=#b45f06][b]AddItemMenu[/b][/color]" to get the armor.
    Ether of these two would help.
    https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66736
    https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905

Once again, pretty much appreciate your comments and endorsements.
author: NilsonLau
